mapper.select: select sum(`actual_amount`) as data, DATE_FORMAT(paybill_time,'%m') as datetime from paybill_f where date_format(paybill_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m') and statu!='0' and statu!='1' and statu!='3' and statu!='E' and statu!='F' and statu!='G';

select sum(`actual_amount`) as data, DATE_FORMAT(rebill_time,'%m') as datetime from rebill_f where date_format(rebill_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m') and statu!='0' and statu!='1' and statu!='3' and statu!='E' and statu!='F' and statu!='G';

SELECT SUM(`actual_amount`) AS DATA, DATE_FORMAT(rebill_time,'%m') AS DATETIME FROM rebill_f WHERE DATE_FORMAT(rebill_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y') AND rebill_type = '4' OR rebill_type = '5' and statu!='0' and statu!='1' and statu!='3' and statu!='E' and statu!='F' and statu!='G' GROUP BY MONTH(rebill_time);
select sum(`total_cost`) as data, DATE_FORMAT(record_date,'%m') as datetime from cost where date_format(record_date,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y') group by month(record_date);

select sum(`actual_amount`) as data, DATE_FORMAT(rebill_time,'%m') as datetime from rebill_f where date_format(rebill_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y') and statu!='0' and statu!='1' and statu!='3' and statu!='E' and statu!='F' and statu!='G' group by month(rebill_time);

SELECT c.`contract_code`,r.name, r.produc_code,SUM(r.number) AS quantity, package_unit,single_package_type, DATE_FORMAT(c.`create_date`,'%m') AS DATETIME ,DATE_FORMAT(`sign_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') as sign_time,end_addr,(SELECT NAME FROM customers_c WHERE id = customers_c_id) AS cust_name FROM (SELECT id,contract_code,customers_c_id,sign_time,end_addr,create_date,statu FROM contract_c) c LEFT JOIN (SELECT reference_id,NAME,produc_code,package_unit,number,single_package_type FROM reference_product_c) r ON c.`id`=r.`reference_id` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(`create_date`,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y') and c.statu!='0' and c.statu!='1' and c.statu!='3' and c.statu!='E' and c.statu!='F' and c.statu!='G' GROUP BY NAME,contract_code;

SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS data, create_by AS datetime FROM contract_c WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%y-%M') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%y-%M') and statu!='0' and statu!='1' and statu!='3' and statu!='E' and statu!='F' and statu!='G' GROUP BY create_by
